experiences.description: As a Senior AWS SRE, I specialize in maintaining and optimizing scalable, resilient, and secure cloud infrastructure. With extensive experience in AWS architecture, I ensure high availability, reliability, and
Develop and implement the company's technology strategy aligned with business goals. Provide leadership and guidance in technology planning, innovation, and development.

As a Head of Information Security and Compliance, am tasked with the critical responsibility of ensuring an organization's digital assets are protected and that it adheres to relevant laws and regulations.
Work closely with Application Architects, Engineers, Product Managers and System Administrators to meet their service automation and project needs.
